snippet: The app's creators plan to introduce the option to summon a cab on Wednesday, but taxi officials say the program may have a significant problem: city rules do not allow prearranged rides in yellow taxis. Read more »
abstract: The app's creators plan to introduce the option to summon a cab on Wednesday, but taxi officials say the program may have a significant problem: city rules do not allow prearranged rides in yellow taxis. Read more »

headline.main: Uber Is Coming to Taxis in New York, If Law Allows
